column4: Can someone help me with building drivers for my TV card? My card is supported, but when I try to build the driver, it stops due to an error.
paste  the error ?
I'll pastebin is, one second.
Cskiboy++
compiz ?
pastebin.com/zgqN7LRE
That's where it stops.
yeah not much there, you'll probably have to search if kmap_atomic has changed recently , is what you're building for 2.6 or 3.0 ?
what are you building ?
I'm building the driver for my TV card.
oh right :)
Sorry, I'm very new to Linux, what do you mean for 2.6 or 3.0?
if I had to guess , you're building a program that was built for the kernel 2.6 on the 3.0 kernel, kmap that deals with kernel virtual memory
what version of ubuntu are you using ?
also where did you get this code ?
The command I'm using?
what are you building ?
Here is the guide I'm following. http://www.linuxtv.org/wiki/index.php/How_to_Obtain,_Build_and_Install_V4L-DVB_Device_Drivers
found this, http://lwn.net/Articles/356378/ , but it looks like a serious pain in the ass - somewhere along the line the function kmap() changed
I wouldn't have a clue how to do any of those steps...
